com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart

Class ChartPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.ChartPlotter

  • public class ChartPlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    The chart panel that effectively plots charts. The types of charts are line, bar, candlestick and histogram.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Detail

      • chartInsets

        private static double[] chartInsets
        The frame or plot insets, as a top, right, bottom and left factor of the available plot area. If, for example, the available width is 1400 pixels, a left inset of 0.02 will leave 28 pixels free of any paint to the left.

        private ChartContainer container
        Container.
